voice.desc: A place to discuss the upcoming social media platform, Voice.

boid.desc:
BOID - The social supercomputer - where users are rewarded for contributing their spare computing power to academic research, such as medicine, meteorology, aerospace and machine learning. 

 [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/github.svg)](https://github.com/boid-com) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/boidcom) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/telegram.svg)](https://t.me/Boidcom_official) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/discord.svg)](https://discordapp.com/invite/zJnRpVz) - [![](https://atmosdb.novusphere.io/discussions/upload/image/1584012485010.png)](https://newdex.io/trade/boidcomtoken-boid-eos) - [![](https://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/bancor-2.svg)](https://xnation.io/eos?base=BNT&quote=BOID)

mpt.desc:
MPT aims to revolutionize the metal packaging supply chain, by making it more cost-effective, eliminating or reducing the economic advantages of other less recyclable packaging materials. 

 [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/MetPackToken) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/telegram.svg)](https://t.me/joinchat/GHpqDxLMYCvr2_g9PvwRCw) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/discord.svg)](https://discordapp.com/invite/zJnRpVz) - [![](https://atmosdb.novusphere.io/discussions/upload/image/1584012485010.png)](https://newdex.io/trade/metpacktoken-mpt-eos) - [![](https://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/bancor-2.svg)](https://xnation.io/eos?base=BNT&quote=MPT)

puml.desc:
PUML rewards its members to complete step & physical activity challenges with it's blockchain tokens, which can be spent on health/fitness products & services. 

 [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/github.svg)](https://github.com/pumlapp) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/pumlhealthio) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/telegram.svg)](https://t.me/pumlofficial)

bbt.desc:
BlockBase is a distributed system that applies many of blockchain related paradigms to provide secure and distributed database storage services. 

 [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/github.svg)](https://github.com/blockbasenetwork/documentation) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/twitter.svg)](https://t.me/BlockBaseNetwork) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/telegram.svg)](https://t.me/BlockBaseNetwork) - [![](https://atmosdb.novusphere.io/discussions/upload/image/1584012485010.png)](https://newdex.io/trade/blockbasetkn-bbt-eos)

atmos.desc:
ATMOS powers Discussions.app. With transaction fees going to token holders. 

 [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/github.svg)](https://github.com/Novusphere/) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/thenovusphere) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/telegram.svg)](https://t.me/eosdiscussionsapp) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/discord.svg)](https://discord.gg/udb5N4X) - [![](https://atmosdb.novusphere.io/discussions/upload/image/1584012485010.png)](https://newdex.io/trade/novusphereio-atmos-eos) - [![](https://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/bancor-2.svg)](https://xnation.io/eos?base=BNT&quote=ATMOS)

govrn.desc:
Decentralized, on-chain, incentive based governance layer for any social organization.

nco.desc:
NovaCrypto (NCO) is a Swiss startup that aims to create a high security blockchain based liquid market of software licences. 

 [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/NovaCryptoLTD) - [![](https://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/bancor-2.svg)](https://deweb.eosnation.io/#/NCO)

krown.desc:
KROWN DAC makes tools to activate communities. The KROWN DAC has been initiated to provide a set of equitable tools for community and product leaders as well as members within communities. 

 [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/twitter.svg)](https://twitter.com/krowndac) - [![](http://cdn.novusphere.io/static/discussions/icons/telegram.svg)](https://t.me/krowntoken) - [![](https://atmosdb.novusphere.io/discussions/upload/image/1584012485010.png)](https://newdex.io/trade/krowndactokn-krown-eos)
